article: hundreds of greek employees , mainly civil servants , held stoppages and a demonstration in the center of athens on tuesday afternoon , protesting the austerity measures , as the government discussed the new tax bill which will be tabled in parliament officially on wednesday .
abstract: greek civil servants greet government 's tax bill with new strikes protests
